expo.name: Paris.rb conf
expo.description: Meet other Ruby enthusiasts from all over the World at Paris.rb conf 2018. The conference will be held in Paris this June 28-29. Come to exchange, listen to great talks, and learn whatâ€™s new in Ruby.

infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: We don't track your location but some of the app modules have this feature though they are not used by the app.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Camera is needed to scan your QRcode.
